Klasse LabyrinthView

com.example.labyrinthapp.LabyrinthView

public class LabyrinthView extends androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView
Custom view for displaying a labyrinth.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • LabyrinthView

      public LabyrinthView(android.content.Context context, android.util.AttributeSet attrSet)
      Constructs a new labyrinthView and sets character to starting position.
      Parameter:
      context - The context.
      attrSet - The attribute set.

  • Methodendetails

    • setLabyrinth

      public void setLabyrinth(int[][] labyrinth)
      Sets the given labyrinth and sets the path, wall and entrance textures based on the current level.
      Parameter:
      labyrinth - The labyrinth which should be drawn.

    • setPlayerIndex

      public void setPlayerIndex(int x, int y)
      Sets the current player position/index.
      Parameter:
      x - Current x-position (row) of the player.
      y - Current y-position (column) of the player.

    • onDraw

      protected void onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Draws the labyrinth on the canvas and calls the drawPlayer method. Calculates the size of the quads which then form the labyrinth.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      onDraw in Klasse android.widget.ImageView
      Parameter:
      canvas - Canvas to be drawn on.

    • drawPlayer

      private void drawPlayer(int labX, int labY)
      Draws the player at the given position.
      Parameter:
      labX - X-value (row) of the player in the labyrinth.
      labY - Y-value (column) of the player in the labyrinth.
